```{r read-manifest, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(bs4cards)

images <- "https://djnavarro.net/series-grid-graphics/manifest.csv" %>% 
  read_csv() %>% 
  filter(
    resolution %in% c(800, 4000), 
    format == "png"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    path = paste0("https://djnavarro.net/series-grid-graphics/", path)
  ) %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = resolution, 
    names_prefix = "path_", 
    values_from = path
  ) 
```

> Version 1

```{r version1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
images %>%
  filter(sys_id == "sys01") %>% 
  cards(
    image = path_800,
    link = path_4000,
    layout = "image-only", 
    border_radius = 0,
    border_width = 0, 
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )  
```
